note: 2026 REGULATION RESET - Starting from actual 2025 team standings with increased uncertainty. Driver skill carries over, car performance is highly uncertain until testing.

McLaren.note: 2025 WCC champions (833 pts) - dominant but new PU regs

Mercedes.note: 2025 P2 (469 pts) - works team, Hamilton departed

Red Bull Racing.note: 2025 P3 (451 pts) - close fight with Mercedes

Ferrari.note: 2025 P4 (398 pts) - works Ferrari PU unknown

Williams.note: 2025 P5 (137 pts) - best of rest, Mercedes customer

RB.note: 2025 P6 (92 pts) - Red Bull junior team

Aston Martin.note: 2025 P7 (89 pts) - Honda works team wildcard

Audi.note: 2025 P9 as Kick Sauber (70 pts) - now works team

Alpine.note: 2025 P10 (22 pts!) - disastrous season, Renault works

Cadillac F1 Team.note: EXPANSION TEAM - brand new to F1, Ferrari customer PU

learning_note: Based on actual 2025 standings: McLaren dominant (833 pts), Mercedes/Red Bull close P2-P3 (469/451), Williams best midfield (P5). Driver skill preserved. 3x normal uncertainty due to regulation reset. Model learns from testing (Feb 2026).
